 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתָה‎</span><sub>217</sub> **verb** ==drink== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šatû***</u></abbr>, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שתה‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁתָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִשְׁתִּי‎</span>, [<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">], <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שתי‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii (1883), 403</sup> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 124</sup>); — 

**Qal**<sub>216</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Exod.34.28|Exod 34:28]] +, 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתִ֫יתִי‎</span> [[1Sam.1.15|1Sam 1:15]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁתֶּה‎</span> [[Gen.44.5|Gen 44:5]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁתֶּה‎</span> [[1Kgs.19.8|1Kgs 19:8]], usually <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּשְׁתְּ‎</span> [[Gen.9.21|Gen 9:21]]+; jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיֵשְׁתְּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.13.18|1Kgs 13:18]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֵּשְׁתְּ‎</span> [[Num.20.11|Num 20:11]] 2 masculine singular with apocope <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּשְׁתְּ‎</span> [[Judg.13.14|Judg 13:14]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֵּשְׁתְּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.13.22|1Kgs 13:22]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֵשְׁתְּ‎</span> [[Gen.24.46|Gen 24:46]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁתָּי֑וּן‎</span> [[Ps.78.44|Ps 78:44]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתֵה‎</span> [[Gen.24.14|Gen 24:14]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתֹה‎</span> [[Isa.21.5|Isa 21:5]]; [[Jer.49.12|Jer 49:12]] (in [[1Sam.1.9|1Sam 1:9]] after preposition, anomalous, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:113e»§ 113e</sup>, omitted by [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and modern), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתוֺ‎</span> [[Jer.25.28|Jer 25:28]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.22.13|Isa 22:13]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75n»§ 75n</sup>); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְוֺ‎</span> [[Prov.31.4|Prov 31:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתוֺת‎</span> [[Jer.35.8|Jer 35:8]]; [[Jer.35.14|Jer 35:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁתּתֹ‎</span> [[Gen.24.19|Gen 24:19]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתוֺתוֺ‎</span> [[1Kgs.13.33|1Kgs 13:33]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁתּוֺתָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.51.22|Isa 51:22]] etc.; ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁתֶה‎</span> [[Isa.29.8|Isa 29:8]] +, feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁתָה‎</span> [[Job.6.4|Job 6:4]], etc.; — 

**1. a.** ==of man:== ***drink***, water, wine, etc., [[Exod.34.28|Exod 34:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), compare [[Exod.15.24|Exod 15:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.30.12|1Sam 30:12]]; [[Amos.2.8|Amos 2:8]]; [[Amos.4.8|Amos 4:8]]; [[Amos.5.11|Amos 5:11]]; [[Isa.5.22|Isa 5:22]]; [[Isa.62.8|Isa 62:8]]; [[Isa.62.9|Isa 62:9]]; [[Prov.31.4|Prov 31:4]]; [[Judg.13.4|Judg 13:4]]; [[Judg.13.7|Judg 13:7]]; [[Judg.13.14|Judg 13:14]] + often (2 t. [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; 6 t. [[BDB#D|D]]); by measure (short allowance) [[Ezek.4.11|Ezek 4:11]]; [[Ezek.4.16|Ezek 4:16]] milk [[Ezek.25.4|Ezek 25:4]], compare [[Song.5.1|Song 5:1]] blood [[1Chr.11.19|1Chr 11:19]] (figurative of water gained by hazard); figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמָתָם שֹׁתָה רוּחִי‎</span> [[Job.6.4|Job 6:4]] ***whose venom*** [of arrows of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***my spirit drinks up***; accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of source [[Exod.7.18|Exod 7:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), v[[Exod.7.21|Exod 7:21]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Exod.15.23|Exod 15:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Prov.5.15|Prov 5:15]] (figurative); accusative (of wine, water, etc.) omitted [[Gen.24.14|Gen 24:14]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.27.25|Gen 27:25]]; [[Gen.43.34|Gen 43:34]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]) + 11 t. [[BDB#J|J]], [[Exod.7.24|Exod 7:24]]; [[Exod.17.6|Exod 17:6]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Num.20.5|Num 20:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), v[[Num.20.11|Num 20:11]]; [[Num.33.14|Num 33:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Judg.15.19|Judg 15:19]] + often; accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁין‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.27|2Kgs 18:27]] = [[Isa.36.12|Isa 36:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַמְתַקִּים‎</span> [[Neh.8.10|Neh 8:10]] absolute [[Eccl.2.24|Eccl 2:24]] +; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of source [[1Kgs.17.4|1Kgs 17:4]]; [[1Kgs.17.6|1Kgs 17:6]]; [[Ps.110.7|Ps 110:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכֹּסוֺ‎</span> [[2Sam.12.3|2Sam 12:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמִזְרְקֵי יַיִן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Amos.6.6|Amos 6:6]], compare [[Gen.44.5|Gen 44:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיַיִן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Prov.9.5|Prov 9:5]] 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> partitive [[Gen.9.21|Gen 9:21]]; [[Exod.7.24|Exod 7:24]]; [[Ruth.2.9|Ruth 2:9]], also (figurative) [[Jer.51.7|Jer 51:7]] (and [[Job.21.20|Job 21:20]] infra). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** participle as substantive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁתֵי מַיִם‎</span> [[Ezek.31.14|Ezek 31:14]]; [[Ezek.31.16|Ezek 31:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁתֵי יַיִן‎</span> [[Joel.1.5|Joel 1:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺתֵי שֵׁכָר‎</span> [[Ps.69.13|Ps 69:13]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***drink*** wine in sacrificial feast [[Deut.32.38|Deut 32:38]] (poem); blood of sacrificial victim [[Ps.50.13|Ps 50:13]] (figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** subject animals [[Num.20.19|Num 20:19]]; [[Jonah.3.7|Jonah 3:7]] (both + men), also (figurative) [[Ezek.34.18|Ezek 34:18]]; [[Ezek.34.19|Ezek 34:19]] accusative (water) omitted [[Gen.24.19|Gen 24:19]]; [[Gen.24.22|Gen 24:22]]; [[Gen.30.38|Gen 30:38]] (twice in verse). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** figurative of drinking cup of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s wrath, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתאכּוֺס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמָתוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.51.17|Isa 51:17]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיַּד י‎</span>), compare v[[Isa.51.17|Isa 51:17]], v[[Isa.51.22|Isa 51:22]], see also [[Ezek.23.32|Ezek 23:32]]; [[Ezek.23.34|Ezek 23:34]] and (accusative omitted) [[Jer.25.16|Jer 25:16]]; [[Jer.25.26|Jer 25:26]]; [[Jer.25.27|Jer 25:27]] + 8 t. Jeremiah; [[Hab.2.16|Hab 2:16]] absolute [[Obad.1.16|Obad 1:16]] (3 t. in verse); accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמָרִים‎</span> [[Ps.75.9|Ps 75:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵחֲמַת שַׁדַּי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Job.21.20|Job 21:20]]. **feminine** ***drink*** blood, figurative of slaughter, [[Num.23.24|Num 23:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; of lion, metaphor of Israel), [[Zech.9.15|Zech 9:15]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּמָם‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָמוּ‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>Manuscripts</sup> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]); so (blood of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s sacrifice) [[Ezek.39.17|Ezek 39:17]]; [[Ezek.39.18|Ezek 39:18]]; [[Ezek.39.19|Ezek 39:19]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **g.** figurative of wicked deeds: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵין חֲמָסִים יִשְׁתּוּ‎</span> [[Prov.4.17|Prov 4:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָֽחֲמוּ לֶחֶם רֶשַׁע‎</span>; these are their food and drink), compare [[Job.15.16|Job 15:16]]; [[Job.34.7|Job 34:7]], but [[Prov.26.6|Prov 26:6]] apparently = ***suffers*** violence (compare [[BDB#De|De]] Toy). 

**2.** late, = ***feast*** [[Esth.3.15|Esth 3:15]]; [[Esth.7.1|Esth 7:1]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁתֶּה‎</span>). **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁתֶה‎</span> [[Lev.11.34|Lev 11:34]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) all which ***is*** (may be) ***drunk***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of vessel. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁתָּ֑וָה‎</span> [[Prov.27.15|Prov 27:15]] see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוה‎</span> ***near the end*** For ***cause, give, to drink*** see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁקה‎</span>.
